text: vignette shows VickyA4 transforms three assignment PDFs reproducible corpus explore : PDFs bundled inst/extdata/. data-raw/course_dataset.R extracts text metadata (pages, words, sentences). result stored course_dataset (tibble shipped package). launch_app() opens Shiny UI helps users reach similar conclusions original analyses interactively exploring corpus (e.g., document length, estimated reading time, quick comparisons). goal traceability: anyone can rebuild dataset PDFs, see interactive interface guides interpretation.

title: getting-started
text: Columns (summary): source: heuristic label ("A1", "A2", "A3") human-readable label derived file name. n_paragraphs: paragraphs count pdftools::pdf_info(). n_words: rough word count based whitespace tokenization. n_chars: approximate character count via punctuation. title: Explorable Insights from Assignments 1–3
text: VickyA4 small R package turns Assignment 1–3 deliverables (PDFs blog) reproducible, structured corpus teaching exploration. ships : tidy document-level dataset course_dataset built PDFs inst/extdata/ (external downloads). Shiny app (inst/app/) interactively explore word counts, pages, estimated reading time, etc. pkgdown site function documentation getting-started vignette. package PDFs? reproducibility beats screenshots. data-raw/ pipeline converts static PDFs consistent, analysis-ready table can versioned, documented, reused across assignments.
